metadata.title: DPM/FM Dar arrives in Doha to lead delegation at Ministerial Meeting

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Sept 14 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister / Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Sunday arrived in Doha to lead Pakistan's delegation at the Ministerial meeting ahead of the Emergency Arab-Islamic Summit on Israel's attack against the State of Qatar. Upon arrival, the DPM/FM was received by Pakistan's Ambassador to Qatar Pakistan's PR to OIC, and senior officials of the Qatari government, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
